author: Daniel Nasaw
title: Mitt Romney Announces Run for Utah Senate Seat
text:
WASHINGTON—Former Massachusetts Gov. Mitt Romney will run for the U.S. Senate seat from Utah being vacated by longtime Sen. Orrin Hatch, he said in a video announcement Friday.
“I have decided to run for the U.S. Senate because I believe I can help bring Utah’s values and Utah’s lessons to Washington,” the 2012 Republican presidential nominee said in the video.
